info.name: FANDOM Discussions
info.description: Material-ish IRC-ish design for FANDOM's Discussions. Useful for moderators.
info.additionalInfo:
V 1.2.5 26/07/2017: hot fixes to rail changes
V 1.2.4 06/07/2017: more stable fixes to badge, main content positioning
V 1.2.3 04/07/2017: hot fixes to rail changes
V 1.2.2 07/04/2017: Quick patch for user badge alignment
V 1.2.1 02/02/2017: User badges align correctly.
V 1.2.0 01/02/2017: New and updated. Slightly larger but now with more stuff people actually use. Fixed loads of problematic positioning.
V 1.1.2 24/08/2016: Quick fix for edit categories, qt and overlapping text
V 1.1.1 24/08/2016: Shifted things to fit categories list and filter
V 1.1.0 20/08/2016: Put onto userstyles :O
